EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou
请点击此处阅读此邮件的中文版本
Dear Parents,
We would like to remind you of changes to our fee structure that will be applied from Term 1, 2014/15. These changes were announced to parents on 31st March, 2014. Please CLICK HERE to read the original email from Mr. Thomas. Here are the main points:
Tuition fees for 2014/15 have been increased by an average of just over 4%
A 5% discount is available for yearly payments
Termly fee payments have been adjusted to recognise a longer term 1 so annually, fees are now split more fairly over the three school terms (Term 1=40%, Term 2=30% and Term 3 = 30%)
Bus fees have been increased by 3%
No increases have been applied to lunch fees
Exam fees are now fully covered within standard tuition fees (this includes all IGCSE and A-Level fees applied from external examination boards)
Costs of normal Residential trips and 1-1 devices will continue to be covered within standard tuition fees.
For full details of all our school fees, please CLICK HERE.
Kind regards,
Admissions Office
The British School of Guangzhou
